Description.Name: Cargo Space
Description.Details: The Kiso is equipped with a significant amount of storage space for construction equipment. However, in a pinch, that same equipment can provide the Kiso with additional stability during a pitched battle thanks to the sheer weight of the equipment keeping the Kiso balanced during combat. Of course, it's a rather low-tech solution to the issue, but hey, if it works, it works.

Description.Name: Cargo Space
Description.Details: The heavy cargo stored in the Dig King's storage compartment provides it with additional stability during pitched combat situations, increasing its stability threshold.
